name: Cookie's Way Home
description:
This is my first ever submission to the Jame Gam. The theme was: Surveillance, and a special feature was a cookie.

I thought a lot of people would use "watch the cookie jar" as a theme, so instead, I chose to go with: get back to the cookie jar without being caught. There's a hungry barmaid that if she hears, smells, or sees you, she will chase you!

So I present a small platformer of 7 levels to go through some basic puzzles on avoiding the barmaid.
